name: Savage Dagger
description:
🔻 Post Game Jam Version 🔻

The great spirits of the forest cast a spell that mixed humans and animals

Only the magic dagger of the Tupe tribe was able to imprison the spirits

The problem? This dagger was too savage to be controlled!

How To Play 🎮

• Controls: Arrows and move Mouse

• Run for your life and survive!

Team ⚒️

• Augusto Gehm: 📐 Game Design 💻 Code

• Euler Moises: 🎵 Audio

• Fabio Teixeira: 🎨 Art

• Fernando Bertuga: 🎨 Art

• Jonathas Moura: 🎨 Art

• Kaish: 💻 Code

• Victor Richtmann: 💻 Code

Game developed for GMTK Game Jam
July 2020
Theme: "Out of Control"  🕹️
